title: How to start a microchip company - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy. First borrow a few billion dollars from your uncle. You will need that much cash to build ultra-clean factories equipped with very expensive photo lithography machines. Then you need about 100 very trained IC designers. Direct them to design a better op-amp or comparator or A/D or D/A or microprocessor or whatever. If they succeed and you still have money left, sell them at barely over your cost until they become popular.

Many of the current start ups are making hardware for very specific workloads. I suggest you look at tasks that network operators, datacenters and other big service and social media providers do at a very deep level and get to putting some ideas together. The idea is important, the implementation process is very well understood.
